name: Guardians of the Ball
description: The Football Metaverse Experience traditional football in a leading edge way. Dive into an authentic, hyperrealist and immersive world made of various football clubs, leagues, players, fans, artists, legends, and more. Interact with other fans in a one-of-a-kind environment, full of emotion and passion where you can enjoy all kinds of events like matches, games, concerts, and many others.
